transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I can't believe this. ("Exposition" appears on bottom of screen) Me. Space Ghost. Hero to millions, stuck here in space prison like some common thug while my show's about to go on without me. All because I mistreated my former teen sidekicks, Jan and Jace, and allegedly assaulted my current sidekick-slash-bandleader, Zorak, in that "Lawsuit" episode.

transcript.speaker: Cyclo
transcript.dialogue: CYCLO LIVES!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Mind your own business, you common thug!

transcript.speaker: Cyclo
transcript.dialogue: Hey! Cyclo was watching that! Cyclo lives for that program!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Watch your lice, you little dip! My show's on now! (TV switches back to the Tra La La Girls) Gimme that!

transcript.speaker: Cyclo
transcript.dialogue: Give Cyclo the remote! (TV switches back to "Coast to Coast") Cyclo doesn't like this at all! (audience boos off-camera; TV switches back to the Tra La La Girls, prompting laughs from audience)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Try gettin' it back, mister! (TV again switches to "C2C"; audience boos)

transcript.speaker: Cyclo
transcript.dialogue: Cyclo must have the remote! (TV switches back to children; audience laughs)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You want ya some? (TV switches back to "C2C"; audience boos) Then come get ya some!

transcript.speaker: Cyclo
transcript.dialogue: Cyclo will come get him some! (TV switches back to children; audience cheers) Cyclo will enact his revenge! (TV switches back to "C2C"; audience boos)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Everybody shut up or I'll whup ya like it's the 60s all over again! (watches "C2C") Set looks strangely bright.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: (singing) Birrrrrd...man!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Birdman? (in background, TV changes to the children singing again) I thought David Brenner was supposed to be the guest Host!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hey, where's David?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Eh, he blew up in the airlock.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Oh. I thought those were beets. Mashed beets.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (laughs) Should I run a mop through it?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Nah. Let's track him all over.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Uh, ok. Well, let's get things started. Um...Greetings citizens! Uh, thanks for tuning in folks. I'm, uh, (singing) Birrrrrd...ma- (starts coughing). Sorry. I'm a bit woozy. I was selling plas...uh, I mean, uh, donating blood when I got the call to fill in for, you know who: the criminal.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Let he who hath not assaulted his teenage sidekicks cast the first stone.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's what I thought.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: The producers have been good enough to move the Ghost Planet closer to the sun so I can use its life-giving, golden rays to bring you exciting, razz-ma-tazz showbiz, um, excitement.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Meet the new boss.

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Dumb as the old boss.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: And if, uh, my wife is watching, I just wanted to say, "Honey, I love you. I'm better now. Come home, baby."

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, come get some.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Wha...? Okay. So, I'm going over there.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: I could use an adult beverage. How long 'til the break?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: (reading a book) No breaks for you, chump.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Hmmmm. Story of my life. Ummm...I'd like to give a bright and shiny welcome to my very first guests...ummmm...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: The Captain and...

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: The Captain and the Tennille. Welcome to my show.

transcript.speaker: Toni Tennille
transcript.dialogue: Thank you!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: So which one of you is The Captain anyway?

transcript.speaker: Toni Tennille
transcript.dialogue: (laughing) He is.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (taunting) Daa-ryl!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Daa-ryl!

transcript.speaker: The Captain
transcript.dialogue: Do you buy these masks at junk shops, that you're wearing, by the way?

transcript.speaker: Zorak and Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Daa-ryl! Daa-ryl!

transcript.speaker: Toni Tennille
transcript.dialogue: Honey, that's not a mask. That's him.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: I'm not sure I follow.

transcript.speaker: The Captain
transcript.dialogue: That's probably because of four-thousand billion light years between us.

transcript.speaker: Zorak and Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Daar-ryl! Daa-ryl!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Well, actually, it's because... (to Zorak and Moltar) Why are you chanting "Daryl"?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: It's his name!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Daryl Dragon.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Oh. That's clever. (pause) DAA-RYL!

transcript.speaker: Zorak and Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Daa-ryl! Daa-ryl!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: I really love that "Muskrat" song.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: DAA-RYL!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: My wife Slyvia and I, it was our song. She left me, you know.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: DAA-RYL!

transcript.speaker: The Captain
transcript.dialogue: Boy, that's...

transcript.speaker: Toni Tennille
transcript.dialogue: That's tough!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: I've tried everything to get her back. I don't know what to do.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: I would.

transcript.speaker: The Captain
transcript.dialogue: If you don't give each other, a little space, your relationship won't last.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: I give her at least 100 yards, as per court order.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: (singing) Syl-via! Come back! Come back!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's the last straw! I've got to get my bleeding chat show back from that bloke!

transcript.speaker: Cyclo
transcript.dialogue: What are you doing, Space Ghost?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (holds up power bands) I'm breaking out of this wretched hive of scum and villainy!

transcript.speaker: Cyclo
transcript.dialogue: Where did Space Ghost get those power bands?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I fashioned them from my own by-products. Come touch them. They're still warm.

transcript.speaker: Cyclo
transcript.dialogue: Cyclo will pass.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Bye-bye, my love. (flies back to Ghost Planet) And now to the Ghost Planet to take back what is rightfully mine!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Okay, I'm lost.

transcript.speaker: Toni Tennille
transcript.dialogue: Respect each other's opinions...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Hey, Birdman!

transcript.speaker: Toni Tennille
transcript.dialogue: And you have to, uh...

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Your wife's on the phone!

transcript.speaker: Toni Tennille
transcript.dialogue: ...listen to each other...

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah. Moltar! Put her on! (Moltar switches picture) Sweetie! Galaxy Pie! I was just talking about you!

transcript.speaker: Galaxy Girl a.k.a. Sylvia
transcript.dialogue: Hello, Harvey.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Did you get my messages? I'm sorry I had to bird-call collect.

transcript.speaker: Galaxy Girl a.k.a. Sylvia
transcript.dialogue: Harvey (whistles) Down boy.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Um, okay. Hi.

transcript.speaker: Galaxy Girl a.k.a. Sylvia
transcript.dialogue: So, um, how's Avenger?

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: He, um, flew away.

transcript.speaker: Galaxy Girl a.k.a. Sylvia
transcript.dialogue: Is that right?

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Look, I've, I've got a show again. A whole show! You always said they'd be crazy to give the Birdman a show again, but here I am with a show! Can I come home now, can I?

transcript.speaker: Galaxy Girl a.k.a. Sylvia
transcript.dialogue: Oh no, Harvey.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: At least let him use the shower!

transcript.speaker: Galaxy Girl a.k.a. Sylvia
transcript.dialogue: (screaming) A cockroach! Gravity ray! (Sylvia zaps Zorak, who starts floating toward the ceiling)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Agh! Help! Help! Hey! The ceiling fan! (Zorak shakes upside down, apparently hitting the fan)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hey! (whistle) Hey boy! C'mon! Over here! (Igoo continues to growl) Rock monkey, wanna peanut?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ow!

transcript.speaker: Zandor
transcript.dialogue: Go away, Space Ghost! We don't want your kind in our idyllic alien home world!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Aw, c'mon, Zandor! All I want is directions. And a perogi.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ow! Hey! Hey! Quit it, you hippies!

transcript.speaker: Dorno
transcript.dialogue: Get lost, you creep. We saw what you did to Jan and Jace!

transcript.speaker: Gloop and Gleep
transcript.dialogue: (subtitles) Space Loaf! Space Loaf! Next time we'll bury you!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Rotten hippie monster commune! After Birdman, you're next!

transcript.speaker: Galaxy Girl a.k.a. Sylvia
transcript.dialogue: Look, Harvey. I didn't exactly call to chat. I need you to sign the papers.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Papers? What papers?

transcript.speaker: Galaxy Girl a.k.a. Sylvia
transcript.dialogue: The divorce papers, Harvey. Remember those? The ones you were supposed to sign months ago?

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Baby, don't make me sign the papers. I'm better now, I swear. Space Ghost is out. The Birdman is in!

transcript.speaker: Galaxy Girl a.k.a. Sylvia
transcript.dialogue: You just don't get it, do you? It's over, Harvey! I'm sorry, I need to get on with my life! So I need you to sign the papers now!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Galaxy Girl, please! I'll straighten up and fly right, I swear!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: I'll stop gambling. I'll go back to therapy. I'll try harder to clean up my droppings.

transcript.speaker: Galaxy Girl a.k.a. Sylvia
transcript.dialogue: Harvey, s-stop it! You're embarrassing yourself in front of the Super Villains. Besides, you know Falcon 7 is the man in my life now.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Huh? Falcon 7?! That beak-stabbing traitor. What's he got that I haven't got?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Your wife.

transcript.speaker: Galaxy Girl a.k.a. Sylvia
transcript.dialogue: Plus, Falcon 7's a real gentleman, who knows how to treat a lady with class and respect.

transcript.speaker: Falcon 7
transcript.dialogue: So, Moltar. Ever make it with a chick who can defy the laws of gravity?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Yes! Many times!

transcript.speaker: Galaxy Girl a.k.a. Sylvia
transcript.dialogue: Look, Harvey. Don't make this harder on yourself.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: (heavy sigh) Oh, all right. I give up. Go have your stupid happy little life without the Birdman.

transcript.speaker: Galaxy Girl a.k.a. Sylvia
transcript.dialogue: You mean you'll sign the papers?

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Whatever you want, dearest.

transcript.speaker: Galaxy Girl a.k.a. Sylvia
transcript.dialogue: Heh, fantastic! Once you're done, steal a stamp and send them to my lawyer, Dr. Nightmare.

transcript.speaker: Dr. Nightmare
transcript.dialogue: (off-camera) Attorney at Law!!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: (dropping his head onto the desk) Galaxy Girl...

transcript.speaker: Galaxy Girl a.k.a. Sylvia
transcript.dialogue: Okay! Bye, Bye Birdie! (monitor goes to static)

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: (crying) I...I know the sun's shining, but it feels so cold. Please somebody, won't somebody just hold me?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: What in the name of the coefficient of the speed of light multiplied by the red shift to the hypotenuse of the nth root...hypotenuse...hypotenuse...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Nobody gets you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Neils Bohr gets me.

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: But, you're supposed to be in jail!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (now standing on the set) Yeah, and you're supposed to be Dumpster-diving for ham scraps, you six-piece Chicken McNobody! Get outta my seat!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Make me!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Destructo-ray!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Solar shield and solar ray!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Hamster tube!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Hamster tube?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: And hamster ray!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Sarin gas!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sarin? Whoa, hold on a second. Time out!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Time in!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Atomic wreck!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yow! My spacesicle! Nerple! Nerple! (??)

transcript.speaker: Toni Tennille
transcript.dialogue: Muskrat, muskrat...

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Ow! Atomic lithium!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: It's time to take a bird bath, bird-brain!

transcript.speaker: Birdman
transcript.dialogue: Get off of me! (off-camera punches)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Destructo ray! (more fighting) Ow! Hey! Knock it off!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: Would you guys shut up? I'm trying to listen here!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Forgive me, Birdman. I've been rash. I've misjudged you, my friend.

transcript.speaker: Toni Tennille
transcript.dialogue: (singing) Sam is so skinny...and they're whirl and they twirl and tangle. Singing and jinging and jangled. Floatin' like the heavens above... Sing along!

transcript.speaker: All
transcript.dialogue: (and very badly) Looks like Muskrat Luuuuu-uuu-uuuhhve!

transcript.speaker: Toni Tennille
transcript.dialogue: And that's it!

transcript.speaker: Toni Tennille
transcript.dialogue: Thank you.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: I love you, Birdman.

transcript.speaker: Kirk the Storyteller
transcript.dialogue: The nightmares. They're relentless! And they're all coming from space!
